queries.name: Check for domain nodes with missing domain property
queries.query: MATCH (d:Domain) WHERE d.domain IS NULL or d.domain = '' RETURN count(d)

queries.name: Check for incorrect domain capitalization
queries.query: MATCH (d:Domain) WHERE d.domain <> toLower(d.domain) RETURN count(d)

queries.name: Check for nodes missing link with tenant
queries.query: MATCH (n:Organization|Contact|Email|PhoneNumber|Location|Tag|User|MergedContact|MergedOrganization|Issue|Workspace|EntityTemplate) where not (n)--(:Tenant) return count(n)

queries.name: Check organization nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:ORGANIZATION_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(o:Organization) WHERE size(labels(o)) <> 2 OR NOT 'Organization_'+t.name in labels(o) return count(o)

queries.name: Check contact nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:CONTACT_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:Contact) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'Contact_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Check email nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:EMAIL_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:Email) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'Email_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Check phone number nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:PHONE_NUMBER_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:PhoneNumber) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'PhoneNumber_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Check location nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:LOCATION_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:Location) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'Location_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Check user nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:USER_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:User) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'User_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Check used email from same tenant
queries.query: MATCH (t1:Tenant)--(n:User|Contact|Organization)--(:Email)--(t2:Tenant) where t1.name <> t2.name return count(n)

queries.name: Check used phone number from same tenant
queries.query: MATCH (t1:Tenant)--(n:User|Contact|Organization)--(:PhoneNumber)--(t2:Tenant) where t1.name <> t2.name return count(n)

queries.name: Check singe TenantMetadata per tenant
queries.query: match (t:Tenant)-->(tm:TenantMetadata) with t, count(tm) as countMetadata where countMetadata > 1 return count(t)

queries.name: Check orphan nodes
queries.query: MATCH (n) WHERE NOT (n)--() AND NOT n:Country AND NOT n:Domain AND NOT n:TechnicalNode return count(n)

queries.name: Check property valid values
queries.query:
CALL {
MATCH (n:Organization)
WHERE n.renewalLikelihood IS NOT NULL AND NOT n.renewalLikelihood IN ['', '0-HIGH', '1-MEDIUM', '2-LOW', '3-ZERO']
RETURN count(n) as cnt
UNION ALL
MATCH (n:Organization)
WHERE n.renewalLikelihoodPrevious IS NOT NULL AND NOT n.renewalLikelihoodPrevious IN ['', '0-HIGH', '1-MEDIUM', '2-LOW', '3-ZERO']
RETURN count(n) as cnt
UNION ALL
MATCH (n:Organization)
WHERE n.billingDetailsFrequency IS NOT NULL AND NOT n.billingDetailsFrequency IN ['', 'WEEKLY', 'BIWEEKLY', 'MONTHLY', 'QUARTERLY', 'BIANNUALLY','ANNUALLY']
RETURN count(n) as cnt
UNION ALL
MATCH (n:Organization)
WHERE n.billingDetailsRenewalCycle IS NOT NULL AND NOT n.billingDetailsRenewalCycle IN ['', 'WEEKLY', 'BIWEEKLY', 'MONTHLY', 'QUARTERLY', 'BIANNUALLY','ANNUALLY']
RETURN count(n) as cnt
} return sum(cnt)

queries.name: Check emails not shared between users
queries.query: MATCH (u:User)-[r1:HAS]->(e:Email)<-[r2:HAS]-(n:User) WHERE u <> n return count(e)

queries.name: Check JobRole nodes without linked contact or user
queries.query: MATCH (j:JobRole) WHERE NOT (j)--(:Contact|User) RETURN count(j)

queries.name: Check multiple organizations share same domain
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:ORGANIZATION_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(org:Organization)-[:HAS_DOMAIN]->(d:Domain) with t, d, count(org) as size_orgs where size_orgs > 1 return count(d)

queries.name: Check missing properties
queries.query: CALL {MATCH (n:Organization) WHERE n.hide IS NULL RETURN count(n) as cnt } return sum(cnt)

queries.name: Check duplicate values
queries.query: CALL {MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:TAG_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(tag:Tag) with t.name as tenant, tag.name as tag_name, count(tag) as size_tags where size_tags > 1 return count(tag_name) as cnt} return sum(cnt)

queries.name: Check synced with event store
queries.query: MATCH (n:User|Organization) where n.syncedWithEventStore is null or n.syncedWithEventStore = false return count(n)

queries.name: Check source fields
queries.query: MATCH (n:User|Email|PhoneNumber|Organization|Issue|Comment|Contract|Opportunity|ServiceLineItem) WHERE n.source IS NULL OR n.sourceOfTruth IS NULL OR n.appSource IS NULL OR n.source = '' OR n.sourceOfTruth = '' or n.appSource = '' RETURN count(n)

queries.name: Check for comments without parent
queries.query: MATCH (c:Comment) WHERE NOT (c)-[:COMMENTED]->() return count(c)

queries.name: Check for contracts without organization
queries.query: MATCH (c:Contract) WHERE NOT (c)<-[:HAS_CONTRACT]-(:Organization) return count(c)

queries.name: Check for multiple renewal opportunities for same contract
queries.query: CALL {MATCH (c:Contract)-[:ACTIVE_RENEWAL]->(op:Opportunity) WITH c, count(op) AS sizeOps WHERE sizeOps > 1 RETURN count(c) AS cnt UNION MATCH (c:Contract)-[:HAS_OPPORTUNITY]->(op:RenewalOpportunity) WHERE op.internalStage='OPEN' WITH c, count(op) AS sizeOps WHERE sizeOps > 1 RETURN count(c) AS cnt} return sum(cnt)

queries.name: Check for contracts with wrong status
queries.query: CALL {MATCH (c:Contract) WHERE c.status <> 'ENDED' AND datetime(c.endedAt) < datetime() RETURN count(c) AS cnt UNION MATCH (c:Contract) WHERE (c.endedAt is null OR datetime(c.endedAt) > datetime()) AND c.status <> 'LIVE' AND datetime(c.serviceStartedAt) < datetime() RETURN count(c) AS cnt} return sum(cnt)

queries.name: Check service line items data consistency
queries.query: CALL {MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem)<-[:HAS_SERVICE]-(c:Contract) WITH sli, count(c) AS sizeContracts WHERE sizeContracts <> 1 RETURN count(sli) AS cnt UNION MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem) WHERE sli.endedAt > sli.startedAt RETURN count(sli) as cnt UNION MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem) WHERE sli.createdAt is null OR sli.updatedAt is null OR sli.startedAt is null OR sli.billed is null OR sli.billed = '' return count(sli) as cnt} return sum(cnt)
